cells.data:
## Purpose

This PCR was testing colonies for confirmation of construct and insert. I did the PCR on both the LB broth and the cleaned DNA using the MIDI kit.

The primers flank the construct and through the end of the insert.

I then See Building the Construct for more details.


## Samples 

Primers: `ES2_confirm_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`

### DNA 1 ul Cleaned product

1.  D. birchii
2.  D. bocki
3.  D. jambulina
4.  D. mealnogaster
5.  D. rufa 

### DNA 1 ul LB broth

1.  D. birchii
2.  D. bocki
3.  D. jambulina
4.  D. mealnogaster
5.  D. rufa 

## Program

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | 64         | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |
